trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle mouse button related routed events, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje metodę, która będzie obsługiwać przycisk myszy powiązane kierowane zdarzenia, na przykład <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events.
trans-unit.target: Ten delegat jest używany z następujących dołączone zdarzenia.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is used with the following routed events.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName>Ten delegat jest używany z następujących kierowane zdarzenia.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUpOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDownOutsideCapturedElement?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.PreviewMouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Te kierowane zdarzenia przekazywania wymienione wcześniej dołączone zdarzenia, aby nadać im dostęp do modelu elementu ogólne w [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName>— <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName>Dołączone zdarzenia i zdarzenia element base kierowane udostępniać swoje dane zdarzeń i propagacji i tunelowania wersji kierowane zdarzenia również udostępniać dane zdarzenia.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseRightButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Może to wpłynąć na obsługiwany właściwości zdarzenia, podczas przekazywania trasy zdarzenia.
